news.title: New technology will enable properties to share solar energy
news.summary: Home Technology Energy & Green Tech June 14, 2017 June 14, 2017 IN the UK alone, some 1.5 million homes are equipped with solar panels, and it has been estimated that by 2020 the figure could soar to 10 million, with the prospect of lower energy…

news.title: New technology will enable properties to share solar energy: Low energy bills for consumers
news.summary: IN the UK alone, some 1.5 million homes are equipped with solar panels, and it has been estimated that by 2020 the figure could soar to 10 million, with the prospect of lower energy bills for consumers and massive reductions in CO2 emissions.
